entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
